#{r_no.value}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM THISCOUPON A LEFT JOIN TMSTCOUPON B ON A.COUPON_NO = B.COUPON_NO WHERE A.M_NO = #{param1} AND ( A.COUPON_NO LIKE '%' || #{param2} || '%' OR B.COUPON_DETAIL LIKE '%' || #{param2} || '%' ) AND A.COUPON_QTY > 0

SELECT A.COUPON_NO ,A.COUPON_DETAIL ,A.COUPON_QTY FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.COUPON_NO ASC) AS ROW_NUM ,A.COUPON_NO ,B.COUPON_DETAIL ,A.COUPON_QTY FROM THISCOUPON A LEFT JOIN TMSTCOUPON B ON A.COUPON_NO = B.COUPON_NO WHERE A.M_NO = #{param1} AND ( A.COUPON_NO LIKE '%' || #{param2} || '%' OR B.COUPON_DETAIL LIKE '%' || #{param2} || '%' ) AND A.COUPON_QTY > 0 ) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{param3} AND #{param4}
